document.full_text: a bahraini military court ordered the death penalty for four men on thursday over the killing of two policemen in recent protests, state media said, a move that could increase sectarian strife in a close u.s. ally.
document.title: bahrain sentences four to die over police killing
lines_and_colors: a bahraini military court ordered the death penalty for four men on thursday over the killing of two policemen in recent protests, state media said, a move that could increase sectarian strife in a close u.s. ally.
